original_text: And if any man's seed of copulation go out from him, then he shall wash all his flesh in water, and be unclean until the even.
korean_text: 설정한 자는 전신을 물로 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: if any man's seed of copulation go out from him
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 어떤 남자의 정액이 그에게서 나오면

sentences.original_text: then he shall wash all his flesh in water
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 모든 살을 물로 씻어야 하며

sentences.original_text: and be unclean until the even
